attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown,
I am sure that you know how many fans of the Blues admire Eric Clapton. I
have followed his career essentially all my adult life and it would be
hard to convey how much pleasure his music has given me. Some time ago Eric Clapton was given a CBE. I don't believe that this is adequate recognition of his contributions to his art. A knighthood is certainly more appropriate!
